spatial_accuracy.notes: Severe structural failure. The room arrangement does not match the floor plan. The central staircase is missing entirely, replaced by a utility-style room. Door and window counts do not align with the blueprint (e.g., the bay window/window seat is missing).

structural_fidelity.notes: Major architectural components such as the Central Hall and technical shafts are ignored. Wall topology is hallucinated, creating a generic office/dormitory layout instead of the specific residential layout shown in the 2D file.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen appliances (REF, Range) and bathroom fixtures (WC) shown in 2D are either missing or replaced with generic brown blocks that do not match the designated zones.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Rendering quality is high with good orthographic projection and soft lighting, but it fails as a verification model because it represents the wrong structure.

detected_errors.description: Missing central staircase and window seat alcove.
Hallucinated interior partitions that do not exist in the source blueprint.
Misplaced bathroom and kitchen utility zones.
Proportions of the dining room versus utility areas are heavily distorted.
